Keyword.Name: CreateNewBankAccount
Keyword.Description: Create New Bank Account - And/Or Verify Status of Create Button after input parameters (Images\Customer\BankAccount\CreateNewBankAccount.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: Bank Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAddress
Param.Description: input Address1;Address2;Address3, separate by semicolon ";", null means by pass input equivalent Address

Param.Name: sCity
Param.Description: City - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCountry
Param.Description: Country - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sState
Param.Description: State - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sZipCode
Param.Description: Zip Code - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPhone
Param.Description: Phone Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFax
Param.Description: Fax Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber1
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 1 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber2
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 2 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPositivePay
Param.Description: Positive Pay - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankID
Param.Description: In case of PositivePay = WellsFargo, this field is required, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCashAccount
Param.Description: Cash Account - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankAccountStatus
Param.Description: Bank Account Status - true means enable - false means disable - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sExpectedCreateStatus
Param.Description: Success or UnSuccess, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: CheckCreateButton(Enable|Disable|EnableAndClick) - means check Status of Create Button is Disable or Enable, EnableAndClick means if button is Enable then click it

Param.Name: sAddress
Param.Description: input Address1;Address2;Address3, separate by semicolon ";", null means by pass input equivalent Address

Param.Name: sCity
Param.Description: City - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCountry
Param.Description: Country - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sState
Param.Description: State - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sZipCode

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAccountNumber

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber1

Param.Name: sBankID

Param.Description: Success or UnSuccess, null means by pass verify

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBankAccount
Keyword.Description: Create New Bank Account - And/Or Verify Status of Create Button after input parameters (Images\Customer\BankAccount\CreateNewBankAccount.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: Bank Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAddress
Param.Description: input Address1;Address2;Address3, separate by semicolon ";", null means by pass input equivalent Address

Param.Name: sCity
Param.Description: City - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCountry
Param.Description: Country - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sState
Param.Description: State - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sZipCode
Param.Description: Zip Code - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPhone
Param.Description: Phone Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFax
Param.Description: Fax Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber1
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 1 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber2
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 2 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPositivePay
Param.Description: Positive Pay - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankID
Param.Description: In case of PositivePay = WellsFargo, this field is required, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCashAccount
Param.Description: Cash Account - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankAccountStatus
Param.Description: Bank Account Status - true means enable - false means disable - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sExpectedCreateStatus
Param.Description: Success or UnSuccess, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: CheckCreateButton(Enable|Disable|EnableAndClick) - means check Status of Create Button is Disable or Enable, EnableAndClick means if button is Enable then click it

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Keyword.Param: DECLARE @RNumber2 nvarchar(100) set @RNumber2 = right (( SELECT (REPLACE(replace(convert(Nvarchar, SYSDATETIME(),14),':',''),'.','')) ),8)+right (( SELECT (REPLACE(replace(convert(Nvarchar, SYSDATETIME(),14),':',''),'.','')) ),4)+right (( SELECT (REPLACE(replace(convert(Nvarchar, SYSDATETIME(),14),':',''),'.','')) ),8) print @RNumber2

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: Comment
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step

Keyword.Name: NewCombineVariable
Keyword.Description: New Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable, NewCombineVariable is only different number of parameter with the old one

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine, range input: 2 --> 17

Keyword.Name: GoToMasterData
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Master Data Feature

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Master Data Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: GoToBankAccounts
Keyword.Description: Master Data - Go To Bank Accounts

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Bank Accounts Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBankAccount
Keyword.Description: Create New Bank Account - And/Or Verify Status of Create Button after input parameters (Images\Customer\BankAccount\CreateNewBankAccount.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: Bank Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAddress
Param.Description: input Address1;Address2;Address3, separate by semicolon ";", null means by pass input equivalent Address

Param.Name: sCity
Param.Description: City - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCountry
Param.Description: Country - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sState
Param.Description: State - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sZipCode
Param.Description: Zip Code - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPhone
Param.Description: Phone Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFax
Param.Description: Fax Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber1
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 1 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber2
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 2 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPositivePay
Param.Description: Positive Pay - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankID
Param.Description: In case of PositivePay = WellsFargo, this field is required, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCashAccount
Param.Description: Cash Account - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankAccountStatus
Param.Description: Bank Account Status - true means enable - false means disable - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sExpectedCreateStatus
Param.Description: Success or UnSuccess, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: CheckCreateButton(Enable|Disable|EnableAndClick) - means check Status of Create Button is Disable or Enable, EnableAndClick means if button is Enable then click it

Keyword.Name: UploadNewPayment
Keyword.Description: Upload new payment (Images\Customer\Payment\20.png)

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TimeToUpload(5) means wait 5s after Upload Payment File

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBankAccount
Keyword.Description: Create New Bank Account - And/Or Verify Status of Create Button after input parameters (Images\Customer\BankAccount\CreateNewBankAccount.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: Bank Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAddress
Param.Description: input Address1;Address2;Address3, separate by semicolon ";", null means by pass input equivalent Address

Param.Name: sCity
Param.Description: City - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCountry
Param.Description: Country - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sState
Param.Description: State - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sZipCode
Param.Description: Zip Code - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPhone
Param.Description: Phone Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFax
Param.Description: Fax Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber1
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 1 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber2
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 2 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPositivePay
Param.Description: Positive Pay - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankID
Param.Description: In case of PositivePay = WellsFargo, this field is required, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCashAccount
Param.Description: Cash Account - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankAccountStatus
Param.Description: Bank Account Status - true means enable - false means disable - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sExpectedCreateStatus
Param.Description: Success or UnSuccess, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: CheckCreateButton(Enable|Disable|EnableAndClick) - means check Status of Create Button is Disable or Enable, EnableAndClick means if button is Enable then click it

Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Bank Accounts Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: Comment
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step

Keyword.Name: CombineVariable
Keyword.Description: Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBankAccount
Keyword.Description: Create New Bank Account - And/Or Verify Status of Create Button after input parameters (Images\Customer\BankAccount\CreateNewBankAccount.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: Bank Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAddress
Param.Description: input Address1;Address2;Address3, separate by semicolon ";", null means by pass input equivalent Address

Param.Name: sCity
Param.Description: City - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCountry
Param.Description: Country - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sState
Param.Description: State - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sZipCode
Param.Description: Zip Code - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPhone
Param.Description: Phone Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFax
Param.Description: Fax Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber1
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 1 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber2
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 2 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPositivePay
Param.Description: Positive Pay - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankID
Param.Description: In case of PositivePay = WellsFargo, this field is required, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCashAccount
Param.Description: Cash Account - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankAccountStatus
Param.Description: Bank Account Status - true means enable - false means disable - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sExpectedCreateStatus
Param.Description: Success or UnSuccess, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: CheckCreateButton(Enable|Disable|EnableAndClick) - means check Status of Create Button is Disable or Enable, EnableAndClick means if button is Enable then click it

Keyword.Name: Comment
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step

Keyword.Name: DetachConnection_AzureStorage

Param.Name: sAccountName
Param.Description: Account Name need to add detach, can't be null,

Keyword.Name: AddConnection_AzureStorage
Keyword.Description: Add Connection to Azure service by using name and key (Images\AzureStorage\AddConnection_AzureStorage.png)

Param.Name: sAccountName
Param.Description: Account Name need to add connection, can't be null

Param.Name: sAccountKey
Param.Description: Account Key need to add connection, can't be null

Keyword.Name: DownloadLatestFile_AzureStorage
Keyword.Description: Download latest file from Azure Storage(Images\AzureStorage\DownloadLatestFile_AzureStorage.png)

Param.Name: sAccountName
Param.Description: Account Name need to download file, can't be null

Param.Name: sBlobName
Param.Description: Blob need to download, can't be null

Param.Name: sDownloadFolder
Param.Description: Folder save file download, , can't be null

Keyword.Name: EncryptDecryptFile
Keyword.Description: Encrypt or Decrypt file by using AutoIT to control tool Decrypt/Encrypte

Param.Name: sInputFile
Param.Description: Input File, LastFileInDownloadFolder = the newest file in Files\Download Folder

Keyword.Name: VerifyStringInFile
Keyword.Description: Verify String in a text file - If file is PDF file, it will convert file PDF --> TXT file, then compare as normal

Param.Name: sFilePath
Param.Description: File name need to verify string in it, LastFile() means newest File in folder AutoTest\TestData\Files\Download

Param.Name: sString1
Param.Description: String 1 need to verify in file, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sString2
Param.Description: String 2 need to verify in file, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sString3
Param.Description: String 3 need to verify in file, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sString4
Param.Description: String 4 need to verify in file, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sString5
Param.Description: String 5 need to verify in file, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result - apply for all strings above - Exist|NotExist
